opendial.bn.distribs

Interface IndependentProbDistribution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProbDistribution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoricalTable, ContinuousDistribution, EmpiricalDistribution, IncrementalDistribution

    public interface IndependentProbDistribution
extends ProbDistribution
    Generic probability distribution P(X1,...,Xn) without conditional variables. The probability distribution may be continuous or discrete.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-20 21:16:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface opendial.bn.distribs.ProbDistribution

        ProbDistribution.DistribType

      • getValues

        java.util.Set<Assignment> getValues()
        Returns a set of possible values for the distribution. If the distribution is continuous, assumes a discretised representation of the distribution.
